room_title: Escape room "Pandorum" by The Escape Company in Orlando
review: Our first escape room experience. It was perfect! The scenario, environment, puzzles, etc. The topping on the cake is the staff and social environment. Everything was great! Well worth the money. No regrets. We didn't even figure it out before time was up, but will spend our hard earnes money again w the Escape Company in Orlando. loved it! Still thinking about it w a smiles on our face. You must try it!
